## RTCClient.startLiveStreamingWithDirect() method

开始单路 CDN 转推

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startLiveStreamingWithDirect(config: QNDirectLiveStreamingConfig): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [QNDirectLiveStreamingConfig](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qndirectlivestreamingconfig.md) | 单路转推配置 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

转推成功会触发 RTCClinetEvent.onStartLiveStreaming 回调
